idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 2; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.1850

descript.abstract: This data set was created from a variety of GIS data layers, primarily hydrographic surveys and depth contours.
descript.purpose: The purpose of this data set is to identify the extent and general location of final designated critical habitat for the southwest Alaska distinct population segment (DPS) of the northern sea otter.
descript.supplinf:
Criteria used to delineate sea otter critical habitat include: 1) nearshore marine waters within 100 meters of the mean high tide line; and 2) nearshore marine waters less than 20 meters in depth contiguous to the mean high tide line.
Base layers were provided by the U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service, U.S. Geological Survey, and the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration. Base layers for different sub-areas were created at various times, and registered to several different versions of the Alaska coastline. Therefore, this layer may not register with other coastline data layers.
In addition, the spatial resolution of the underlying hydrographic survey data are of varying spatial resolutions ranging from 50m to 1,500m. In some areas, this limitation caused an inability to map critical habitat accurately. Exact location of critical habitat can be determined by applying criteria 1 and 2 above to other coastline and bathymetric data layers.

citeinfo.title: Final Designated Critical Habitat for the southwest Alaska DPS of the northern sea otter
citeinfo.othercit: 74 FR 51988 (Designation of Critical Habitat for the Southwest Alaska Distinct Population Segment of the Northern Sea Otter)

status.update: REQUIRED: The frequency with which changes and additions are made to the data set after the initial data set is completed.

theme.themekt: REQUIRED: Reference to a formally registered thesaurus or a similar authoritative source of theme keywords.

idinfo.accconst: REQUIRED: Restrictions and legal prerequisites for accessing the data set.
idinfo.useconst: Data are for illustration purposes only, and should not be used for navigation.
idinfo.datacred: U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service, Marine Mammals Management Office
